content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in München to be a great place to live. Let's discuss the rental price and find a suitable arrangement for both of us. How much were you thinking of offering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mister Schmidt, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I was thinking of 500 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 500 Euro per month is much lower than my expectations for this apartment. It's a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, which is a prime location. The apartment is close to all important facilities, which adds to its value. I'm looking for a price that reflects the quality and location of the apartment. Would you be willing to reconsider your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the location and quality of the apartment are very attractive. However, I am a student and my budget is limited. I am willing to pay 600 Euro per month. I am also a smart and dependable person, and I am willing to sign a long-term lease if necessary. I hope we can find a mutually satisfactory agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 600 Euro per month is more in line with the value of the apartment, but it still falls short of my expectations. I'm willing to negotiate further, but I need to make sure that the rent reflects the investment I've made in this property. The location and amenities make it a highly sought-after rental. Would you be open to discussing a price closer to 800 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay 700 Euro per month. I am also a very responsible person, and I will take good care of your apartment. I hope we can find a mutually satisfactory agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 700 Euro per month is closer to what I had in mind, but I'd like to hear more about why you think this is a fair price for the apartment. Remember, it's in the city center, which is a highly desirable location. Could you justify your offer based on the apartment's features and location?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Certainly, Mister Schmidt. I understand that the apartment is in a prime location, which adds to its value. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. I am willing to pay 700 Euro per month because I believe this is a fair price for the apartment, considering my budget and the fact that it is unfurnished. I am also a smart and responsible person, and I will take good care of your apartment. I hope we can find a mutually satisfactory agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your commitment to taking care of the apartment and your responsible nature are commendable. However, I must emphasize that the location and the recent construction of the building justify a higher rent. The proximity to essential facilities and the city center make it an excellent choice for someone looking for a convenient and modern living space. Would you be willing to go up to 750 Euro per month, considering the value of the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your explanation of the value of the apartment. I am willing to pay 740 Euro per month. I believe this is a fair price, considering my budget and the fact that the apartment is unfurnished. I hope we can find a mutually satisfactory agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 740 Euro per month is appreciated, and it reflects your understanding of the apartment's value. However, I must reiterate that the location and the quality of the construction are key factors that should be reflected in the rent. Would you be willing to go up to 750 Euro per month to secure this prime living space in the city center?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. I am willing to pay 750 Euro per month. I believe this is a fair price, considering my budget and the fact that the apartment is unfurnished. I hope we can find a mutually satisfactory agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Excellent! I'm glad we've reached an agreement on the rent. The price of 750 Euro per month reflects the quality and location of the apartment. I'm sure you'll find it to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Would you like to discuss any other terms or conditions of the lease?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I am pleased with the rental price. I don't have any other conditions to discuss. I am a responsible person, and I will take good care of your apartment. I hope we can maintain a good relationship.
